query: Show me courses from Udacity in Business and Business Related domain

original_data.Title: Microsoft Power Platform
original_data.Short Intro: Build powerful business apps with Microsoft Power Platform.
original_data.Prequisites:
No prior knowledge of Microsoft Power Platform or other Microsoft products  is required. Anyone who is interested in building apps with no prior programming experience can take this course.
See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.

original_data.Title: A/B Testing for Business Analysts
original_data.Short Intro: Run business experiments
original_data.Prequisites: No programming experience required.Interested in using data to make better business decisions.Alteryx license (provided to Nanodegree students at no cost, compatible with Windows only).See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.

original_data.Title: How to Become a Business Analyst
original_data.Short Intro: Gain foundational data skills applicable to any industry. Collect and analyze data, model business scenarios, and communicate your findings with SQL, Excel, and Tableau.
original_data.Prequisites: This is an introductory program and has no prerequisites. In order to succeed, we recommend having experience using a computer and being able to download and install applications.
original_data.What you learn: In this program, you’ll learn foundational data skills that apply across functions and industries. You’ll learn to analyze data and build models with Excel, query databases using SQL, and create informative data visualizations with Tableau.

unified_data.title: How to Become a Business Analyst
unified_data.description: Gain foundational data skills applicable to any industry. Collect and analyze data, model business scenarios, and communicate your findings with SQL, Excel, and Tableau.

original_data.Title: Full Stack Web Developer
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to design and develop powerful modern web applications that form the foundation for the apps, websites, and systems that people and businesses use every day.
original_data.Prequisites: To optimize your chances of success in the Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree program, we recommend that you have experience writing and testing software with Python or another object-oriented programming language.
original_data.What you learn: The goal of the Full Stack Web Developer Nanodegree program is to equip learners with the unique skills they need to build database-backed APIs and web applications. A graduate of this program will be able to design and build databases for software applications, create and deploy database-backed web APIs, and secure and manage user authentication and access control for an application backend. Students will also learn how to deploy a Flask-based web application to the cloud using Docker and Kubernetes.

unified_data.title: Full Stack Web Developer
unified_data.description: Learn to design and develop powerful modern web applications that form the foundation for the apps, websites, and systems that people and businesses use every day.

original_data.Title: Become a Data Product Manager
original_data.Short Intro: Leverage data to build products that deliver the right experiences, to the right users, at the right time. Lead the development of data-driven products that position businesses to win in their market.
original_data.Prequisites: Prior Data Analysis & Product Management Experience Recommended
original_data.What you learn: Leverage market data to amplify product development. Learn how to apply data science techniques, data engineering processes, and market experimentation tests to deliver customized product experiences. Begin by leveraging the power of SQL and Tableau to inform product strategy. Then, develop data pipelines and warehousing strategies that prepare data collected from a product for robust analysis. Finally, learn techniques for evaluating the data from live products, including how to design and execute various A/B and multivariate tests to shape the next iteration of a product.

unified_data.title: Become a Data Product Manager
unified_data.description: Leverage data to build products that deliver the right experiences, to the right users, at the right time. Lead the development of data-driven products that position businesses to win in their market.

original_data.Title: Learn SQL
original_data.Short Intro: Master SQL, the core language for Big Data analysis, and enable insight-driven decision-making and strategy for your business.
original_data.Prequisites: Basic understanding of data types (e.g., string, integer, etc.)
original_data.What you learn: Perform analysis on data stored in relational and non-relational database systems to power strategic decision-making. Learn to determine, create, and execute SQL and NoSQL queries that manipulate and dissect large scale datasets. Begin by leveraging the power of SQL commands, functions, and data cleaning methodologies to join, aggregate, and clean tables, as well as complete performance tune analysis to provide strategic business recommendations. Finally, apply relational database management techniques to normalize data schemas in order to build the supporting data structures for a social news aggregator.

unified_data.title: Learn SQL
unified_data.description: Master SQL, the core language for Big Data analysis, and enable insight-driven decision-making and strategy for your business.

original_data.Title: Digital Project Management
original_data.Short Intro: Build confidence translating business requirements into project scope statements, creating project plans in Waterfall or Agile, and developing a high-performing team.
original_data.Prequisites: Professional fluency in English.
original_data.What you learn: You’ll master the skills necessary to successfully manage digital projects by overcoming challenges such as changing priorities, tightening deadlines, limited resources, unexpected pitfalls, and conflicting interests of key stakeholders.

unified_data.title: Digital Project Management
unified_data.description: Build confidence translating business requirements into project scope statements, creating project plans in Waterfall or Agile, and developing a high-performing team.

original_data.Title: Become an AI Product Manager
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to develop AI products that deliver business value. Build skills that help you compete in the new AI-powered world.
original_data.Prequisites: No prior experience is required.
original_data.What you learn:
You’ll learn how to evaluate the business value of an AI product. You’ll start by building familiarity and fluency with common AI concepts. You’ll then learn how to scope and build a data set, train a model, and evaluate its business impact. Finally, you’ll learn how to ensure a product is successful by focusing on scalability, potential biases, and compliance. 

Along the way, you’ll review case studies and examples to help you focus on how to define metrics to measure the business value for a proposed product.

unified_data.title: Become an AI Product Manager
unified_data.description: Learn to develop AI products that deliver business value. Build skills that help you compete in the new AI-powered world.

original_data.Title: AI for Business Leaders
original_data.Short Intro: Master the foundations of artificial intelligence so you can strategically implement AI in your company. Leverage machine learning technologies to power corporate growth, increase efficiency, and enhance customer experiences.
original_data.Prequisites: To optimize your chances of success in this Executive Program, we recommend prior exposure to statistics and probability, as well as experience in business decision-making in an IT or technical environment.
original_data.What you learn: You’ll develop foundational technical knowledge of machine learning and the business applications of artificial intelligence across industries. Through practical case studies, you’ll learn what strategic questions to ask, and how to formulate proposals when evaluating opportunities to embed machine learning processes and artificial intelligence technology into a corporate strategy. Finally, in the capstone project, you will build an AI-backed strategy that can be integrated into your own business.

unified_data.title: AI for Business Leaders
unified_data.description: Master the foundations of artificial intelligence so you can strategically implement AI in your company. Leverage machine learning technologies to power corporate growth, increase efficiency, and enhance customer experiences.

original_data.Title: Predictive Analytics for Business
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to apply predictive analytics and business intelligence to solve real-world business problems
original_data.Prequisites: Students who enroll should be familiar with algebra and descriptive statistics and have experience working with data in Excel. Working knowledge of SQL and Tableau is a plus, but not required.
original_data.What you learn: Learn to apply predictive analytics and business intelligence to solve real-world business problems.

unified_data.title: Predictive Analytics for Business
unified_data.description: Learn to apply predictive analytics and business intelligence to solve real-world business problems

original_data.Title: Digital Freelancer
original_data.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for digital freelancers by building your personal brand and starting a successful online business.
original_data.Prequisites: Basic computer skills.
original_data.What you learn: You’ll master the skills necessary to become a successful digital freelancer. Learn how to market your services to clients, scope projects and manage client relationships.

unified_data.title: Digital Freelancer
unified_data.description: Meet the growing demand for digital freelancers by building your personal brand and starting a successful online business.

original_data.Title: Data Science for Business Leaders
original_data.Short Intro: Master the strategic decision-making skills for the people, platforms, and processes required to leverage the power of Data Science in your business.
original_data.Prequisites: To optimize your chances of success in this Executive Program, we recommend prior exposure to statistics and probability, as well as experience in business decision-making in an IT or technical environment.
original_data.What you learn: This course provides business leaders and managers with strategies and guidelines for how best to solve the human capital, technological, and management challenges of building data science into the business. Students will gain skills in identifying opportunities for data science across many functional areas of the business, as well as learn the tools to prioritize and execute on those opportunities as part of a data science initiative.

unified_data.title: Data Science for Business Leaders
unified_data.description: Master the strategic decision-making skills for the people, platforms, and processes required to leverage the power of Data Science in your business.

original_data.Title: Cloud Architect using Microsoft Azure
original_data.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for Azure cloud architects and learn the skills to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.
original_data.Prequisites: Experience with cloud computing, programming and Microsoft Azure.
original_data.What you learn: This program prepares students for a career as an Azure Solution Architect and trains them to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.

unified_data.title: Cloud Architect using Microsoft Azure
unified_data.description: Meet the growing demand for Azure cloud architects and learn the skills to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.

original_data.Title: Cloud Computing for Business Leaders
original_data.Short Intro: Gain the technical understanding to make tough, IT-driven decisions that unlock the value of cloud computing in your organization.
original_data.Prequisites: Word Processors, Spreadsheets, Presentation Tools.
original_data.What you learn: This program will focus on the unique knowledge and skills that business leaders need to unlock the value of cloud technologies in their organizations, or enable a more cloud-native department that leverages cloud computing to drive growth and create operational efficiencies.

unified_data.title: Cloud Computing for Business Leaders
unified_data.description: Gain the technical understanding to make tough, IT-driven decisions that unlock the value of cloud computing in your organization.

original_data.Title: Cybersecurity for Business Leaders
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to leverage the capabilities of cybersecurity best practices to protect your organization and unlock next-level results.
original_data.Prequisites: None.
original_data.What you learn: Join other leaders around the world by mastering cybersecurity skills that will change the culture of your organization and strengthen your team. In this program, you’ll study cutting-edge topics such as common cyber challenges, detection and response, cybersecurity culture, investments, and threat analysis.

unified_data.title: Cybersecurity for Business Leaders
unified_data.description: Learn to leverage the capabilities of cybersecurity best practices to protect your organization and unlock next-level results.

original_data.Title: SQL for Data Analysis
original_data.Short Intro: Graduate from spreadsheets to databases with this special course on SQL for business! By the end of this course, you’ll be able to use SQL to query multiple tables, join data together from multiple sources, and even extract key business insights from retail databases.
original_data.Prequisites: Familiarity with data types and data visualization.
original_data.What you learn: When it comes to data analysis, Excel will only take you so far. To analyze larger sources of table-based data, you need the power & speed of SQL in your arsenal. In this course, you’ll learn how to manipulate and analyze multiple tables to answer complex business questions, as well as  have the option to learn advanced SQL skills like writing subqueries and advanced joins. This course also includes a hands-on project where you’ll analyze a music store database and find ways for the store to optimize their operations.

unified_data.title: SQL for Data Analysis
unified_data.description: Graduate from spreadsheets to databases with this special course on SQL for business! By the end of this course, you’ll be able to use SQL to query multiple tables, join data together from multiple sources, and even extract key business insights from retail databases.

original_data.Title: Product Strategy
original_data.Short Intro: Learn how to build a bullet-proof vision & strategy for any digital product idea. By the end of this course, you’ll know how to identify the right problems to solve, map out business models for capturing revenue, and successfully pitch your strategy to stakeholders.
original_data.Prequisites: No Experience Required.
original_data.What you learn: Software product development can be chaotic and a strong strategy is often what keeps successful companies on track when others fail. In this course, you’ll learn the ins and outs of developing a rock-solid product strategy directly from a product manager at Uber, one of Silicon Valley’s fastest-growing and innovative tech startups. You’ll learn everything from how to build roadmaps and write PRDs, to how to create a business case for a new product opportunity, to how to present a compelling product pitch to gain internal stakeholder buy-in. You’ll also create and present a product pitch deck of your own to put your new skills to the test.

unified_data.title: Product Strategy
unified_data.description: Learn how to build a bullet-proof vision & strategy for any digital product idea. By the end of this course, you’ll know how to identify the right problems to solve, map out business models for capturing revenue, and successfully pitch your strategy to stakeholders.

original_data.Title: Introduction to Data Analytics for Business
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to apply data & statistics specifically for business! In this course, you’ll go from data novice to spreadsheet wizard, calculating and forecasting key financial metrics, even making detailed projections off real-life financial data from the New York Stock Exchange.
original_data.Courses: Introduction to Data Analytics for Business
original_data.Prequisites: No experience required.
original_data.What you learn: Data literacy is no longer solely expected of analysts & engineers — it’s become a critical skill for anyone who wants to drive decision-making at their company. This practical course is for business professionals looking to add data analysis to their strategy & planning. You’ll dive right into Excel and Google Spreadsheets, manipulating data, calculating key business metrics, and even building financial forecasting models with historical stock-market data.

unified_data.title: Introduction to Data Analytics for Business
unified_data.description: Learn to apply data & statistics specifically for business! In this course, you’ll go from data novice to spreadsheet wizard, calculating and forecasting key financial metrics, even making detailed projections off real-life financial data from the New York Stock Exchange.

original_data.Title: Become a business intelligence analyst.
original_data.Short Intro: Build confidence combining different data types and sources to create sophisticated data models for enterprises across all industries.
original_data.Prequisites: Basic data skills & Excel
original_data.What you learn: You’ll master the business intelligence tools that enterprises need to ensure data accuracy and consistency. This data knowledge will help enterprises understand future risk, analyze different markets, and make critical decisions. Specifically, you’ll learn skills in Power Query, Power BI, and more.

unified_data.title: Become a business intelligence analyst.
unified_data.description: Build confidence combining different data types and sources to create sophisticated data models for enterprises across all industries.
